content:
Going with this reasoning, India should trust animal powered vehicles only. Do they have gas pumps in the jungle?
,https://,m.forbes.com/sites/ellenrwa,ld/2017/05/02/the-real-reason-india-is-talking-up-electric-vehicles/, ,…
If it's protectionism, where are the huge lithium mines of India that will change the game compared to importing oil?
